item.title: CVE-2024-30245|2024-03-28T04:17:55.707Z -- DecaLog -- DecaLog
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in DecaLog.This issue affects DecaLog: from n/a through 3.9.0.
